Class MainCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.chmut.giftit.command.impl.MainCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command

    public class MainCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    The Main command class provides the display of the Main page with the results of the search for items
    Author:
    Sergei Chmut.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public Router execute(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        The method gets the search results (filter) of items and display options for items. Sends that parameters to the service level and gets results. In the absence of errors, the results are saved for view, and we also receive data on the number of comments for each item. In case of errors, the method fixes them and returns Router with Error page path.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface Command
        Parameters:
        request - the request object that is passed to the servlet
        Returns:
        the router object that contains page path for forward

      • getLimitItemsOnPage

        private int getLimitItemsOnPage(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Method gets limit from session and check user's choice for limit. If User change custom limit, set that choice in the session.
        Parameters:
        request - the request object that is passed to the servlet
        Returns:
        the limit items on page parameter

      • getCurrentPage

        private int getCurrentPage(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                           int limit)
        Method gets current page from the session and check user's choice for the page. If user change current page, calculate that page and set in the session.
        Parameters:
        request - the request object that is passed to the servlet
        limit - the custom limit items on page
        Returns:
        the current page

      • calculateCurrentPage

        private int calculateCurrentPage(java.lang.String newPage,
                                 int oldPage,
                                 int limit,
                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Method calculate current page number.
        Parameters:
        newPage - the custom user's new page
        oldPage - the old page
        limit - the limit items on page
        request - the request object that is passed to the servlet
        Returns:
        the number of page
